name: Minoturret
description:
Raging Bull. 

Minoturret is a game about a floating turret gun that attempts to save the life of a self-destructive Minotaur.

How the game works:
  • Enemies rain from the sky and shoot lasers at the Minotaur.
  • You control a small blue turret gun floating around his head. You can fire lasers that are capable of neutralizing both the enemy robots and their lasers. 
  • The Minotaur will charge toward the nearest enemy. He will only stop or change course once his current target is dead. If he hits into his target, it will instantly be destroyed, and he will take a small amount of damage.
  • Each enemy killed (by the turret or the Minotaur) will add 1 to the player's current score. Try to survive for as long as possible!
